items.en: the star that gives Earth light and heat
items.example: There were ten suns in the sky.
items.grammar: 可數/不可數皆可；一般指唯一的太陽前加 the（the sun）

items.en: to burn the surface with great heat
items.grammar: 及物/不及物皆可：scorch something / something scorches

items.en: a person who shoots with a bow and arrow
items.example: Hou Yi was a great archer.

items.grammar: 名詞；常見片語 draw a bow（拉弓）

items.en: a thin pointed stick shot from a bow
items.example: The arrow flew across the sky.
Xihe was the goddess of the suns.
items.grammar: 可數名詞；對應 god（男神）

items.en: a low area between hills or mountains
items.example: They lived in a valley of light.

items.en: a mythical tree where the suns rested
items.grammar: 專有名詞片語；通常前加 the
常接介系詞 from：suffer from N

items.en: a brave person admired for good deeds
to point a weapon at a target
items.grammar: 搭配 at：aim at + 目標

items.en: to hit and make something fall
a male ruler of an empire
items.example: The emperor heard about Hou Yi.
items.grammar: 可數名詞；對應 empress（皇后）

items.en: a magical drink that brings immortality
items.example: He received an elixir as a reward.
items.grammar: 可數名詞；常與 of life 並用（elixir of life）
不可數名詞；形容詞 immortal
